channel.title: How to make a pure command?

item.title: How to make a pure command?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++) { if(i == 1) continue; addSkillXP(Integer.MAX_VALUE, i); } }

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a pure command?
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

Try this, already ready

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(995,2000000); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addItem(391,1); addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); sendMessage("You are now a Pure!"); }

Read full topic
